item.title: This is my first English blog
item.description: Hello, Rmarkdown World! This is the first bolg I wrote by using “Blogdown” package. As a freshman to writing blogs, I met quite a few problems when I tried to practice following the book of Blogdown. This is due to the lack of R basic knowledge of mine, though I have learned R for serval months. I hope I can persist in writing blogs with blogdown, besides, I need to continue to learn R knowledge to improve my R skills.
